title: Scared me shitless
body: Does it scare the hell out of anyone else when after every patch the league volume is reset to 100. It's kind of like the old THX surround intros to every movie ever. Rito mercy pls.

replies.body: I play with my laptops speakers turned off but that must be horrible. Rito get in here and fix it, also we need french maid urgot skin.
Hahaha french maid urgot? prob will be a legacy skin and never will be available again{{champion:6}}
Mine only does it if I change pcs but fuck it does a number on the ears
